title: Help me please!
body: _**Hello, so i got a problem... After the league of legends update to new version i got an issue. When i open LoL client (I mean when i click the launch button) i can see only black screen... I can hear background theme song but i can't write my ID and Password. Please help me. Reinstall didn't helped.**_{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:6}} I really like this game and i wan't to play it :///{{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
This commonly happens if something went wrong during the upgrade. The steps below should assist in bypassing the issue:

> * Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends-AIR ONLY\RADS\system
* Open **user.cfg** with notepad
* Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
* Save the change and launch League again

Let me know if this helped!
